name: Forclawsure
description: As an orbital laser operator for Forclawsure Inc. your job is to cut out tiny worlds from planets according to your customers orders. Slice open the planet while trying to fend off vagrant attackers and consoling your - very talkative - customers. Juggle between pretending to pay attention to your customers - through using the ASDF keys - and operating the laser - by aiming your mouse cursor - while trying to earn as much money for the planet slices as you can in the allotted time limit.
